task.title: Requesting a Read Receipt
task.shortdesc: It is possible to request a read-receipt to be sent to an address when the email is opened. To request a read receipt set the address with setReadReceiptTo().

step.cmd: Set the address you want the receipt to be sent to with the setReadReceiptTo() method on the Message.

result.p: When the email is opened, if the mail client supports it a notification will be sent to this address.
result.note: Read receipts won't work for the majority of recipients since many mail clients auto-disable them. Those clients that will send a read receipt will make the user aware that one has been requested.
